channel.title: [317 PI] InsigniaX || Screw the rest... Play the best! || [317 PI]
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i1299.photobucket.com/albums/ag63/helixworld1/InsigniaX2_zps5e10680e.png[/img]
Sorry the banner looks a little bit bad, i just through that together in a couple minutes i will work more on it in the future
Check us out at: [url=http://InsigniaX.tk]InsigniaX[/url]
Forums: [url=http://insigniax.forumotion.com]InsigniaX - Forums[/url]
Features about the server!
[COLOR="#FFD700"]-602 NPC Amount: 3291 -667 graphics -602 Skill Interface -new staffzone -Fading Hitmarks -Christmas event -Added Working Leech Spec and ALL Saps Curses. -Combat Icons Next to Damage -Dungeoneering - 8 floors -Summoning Special Attacks -Dicing System -10Man "Raid" Style Bosses -Nomad -Introduction of Red Dragons, Very Active Pking -Wilderness Revernants -Custom PK'ing Skill -Elite Slayer Tasks -All NPC's around the World -More Advanaced Skilling than PI -FULLY working Overloads 100% RS -39 Jad Waves, Custom -Unique Custom Home -Dragonfireshield works 100% Charging! -100% Working pvp armours ( Statius, Vesta, Zuriel and Morrigan)! -PKP Shops -100% Corrected Item Stats -Even More NPC Anims Added -Player Owned Shops - by doing ::myshop -Sarabrew doesnt drain stats when overloaded -PERFECT Bridding / Switching -Soulwars Cape & More Items Added -Torva, Korasi, Primal (With Effect's) -Critical Hits (RS Hitsplat) -Fixed Slayer NPC Perfectly Animated and Updated -Instant Loading -Ring of Life & Slayer Helmet Effects -Brilliant Custom Designed Interfaces -667 RS Graphics -Custom Desgined GWD with Interfaces -NEW RS AUTOCAST FEATURE -Working Spirit Shield Effects -Hand Cannon, Arcane Stream, Ring of Vigour Effects -Dungeoneering Skillcape Emotes, Chaotic Shields -NO DUPES, ALL BUGS FIXED sucks for u glitchers lol -602 Animations, 602 GFX, 474 Maps, 614 Items, 317 Characters -Enhanced GFX Rendering Looks Smoother! -Donaters has a portal for funpk :) -Perfect RS Hand Cannon Fixed -Perfect Constitution x10 Hits and HP -Very accurate Special Calcs for PvP Server -Near Flawless Combat System -Perfect RS Chaotic Crossbow -Real RS Dung Teleport /w Kinship Ring -Dungeoneering is by far the most advanced from ANY server! -Working and Completely Custom PK Skill (exp from winning in wild) -Very customisabled source files, as written in PI / DSPK style. -Real RS Barrage Orb's for non freezing barrages. -Perfect full screen -All single doors open -All double doors around the world open -Lots more features! I wasnt going to add to much to this thread[/SIZE]
Pictures
[img]http://i40.tinypic.com/fly39g.png[/img] All stats Do go up to 120 !
[img]http://i40.tinypic.com/n6qsrt.png[/img] All minigames work perfectly fine , been tested all 100%!
[img]http://i42.tinypic.com/9rq1ht.png[/img]
[img]http://i42.tinypic.com/2mruue9.png[/img] 317 Home with 716 Custom Global Objects!
[img]http://i40.tinypic.com/2lihu06.png[/img] Full working barrows with barrow points and chest !
[img]http://i42.tinypic.com/2ewf602.jpg[/img] Perfect mining with all ores!
[img]http://i42.tinypic.com/11t1xd1.png[/img] Jad Works 100% Perfect attacks and really challenging to go through the awesome experience !
[img]http://i44.tinypic.com/24y5wma.png[/img] Perfect Lodestone teleport networks!
[img]http://i39.tinypic.com/31459w9.png[/img] This is the real beasty RS experience where you can't get it anywhere else but here!
[img]http://i43.tinypic.com/69qakn.png[/img] And some of our beasty full working Minigames you can participate in!
[IMG]http://i1299.photobucket.com/albums/ag63/helixworld1/Untitled_zpsee3dcbed.png[/img] Brand new agility!![/center]
Sorry pictures are bad i through them together real fast ill make a better post in the future,
Btw i give credits to hack3r owner of deathlypvpz, he helped me add some interfaces and added lodestone network!
Oh one other thing, you can get a 99 cape, and a max cape at 99. the levels are at 120, for highscores and ranks, or for something to do!

item.title: [317 PI] InsigniaX || Screw the rest... Play the best! || [317 PI]
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

[quote=“Superior Nexon, post:3, topic:527273”] I mean its your opinion, my players are extremely happy, so just don’t judge the server by the cover, play it, if you dont like it (i wouldnt understand why) then you can quit. i mean its all good its a really fun server[/quote]I didn’t base my previous comment on your content, I based it on it’s name and it’s slogan. The first being of nearly the same name of a famous server/source and the slogan being the same as another server.

Read full topic
item.source: [317 PI] InsigniaX || Screw the rest... Play the best! || [317 PI]

item.description:
@Superior_Nexon wrote:

[CENTER]

InsigniaX2_zps5e10680e.png968×175

Sorry the banner looks a little bit bad, i just through that together in a couple minutes i will work more on it in the future

Check us out at: InsigniaX

Forums: InsigniaX - Forums

Features about the server!

[COLOR="#FFD700"]-602 NPC Amount: 3291
-667 graphics
-602 Skill Interface
-new staffzone
-Fading Hitmarks
-Christmas event
-Added Working Leech Spec and ALL Saps Curses.
-Combat Icons Next to Damage
-Dungeoneering - 8 floors
-Summoning Special Attacks
-Dicing System
-10Man “Raid” Style Bosses
-Nomad
-Introduction of Red Dragons, Very Active Pking
-Wilderness Revernants
-Custom PK’ing Skill
-Elite Slayer Tasks
-All NPC’s around the World
-More Advanaced Skilling than PI
-FULLY working Overloads 100% RS
-39 Jad Waves, Custom
-Unique Custom Home
-Dragonfireshield works 100% Charging!
-100% Working pvp armours ( Statius, Vesta, Zuriel and Morrigan)!
-PKP Shops
-100% Corrected Item Stats
-Even More NPC Anims Added
-Player Owned Shops - by doing ::myshop
-Sarabrew doesnt drain stats when overloaded
-PERFECT Bridding / Switching
-Soulwars Cape & More Items Added
-Torva, Korasi, Primal (With Effect’s)
-Critical Hits (RS Hitsplat)
-Fixed Slayer NPC Perfectly Animated and Updated
-Instant Loading
-Ring of Life & Slayer Helmet Effects
-Brilliant Custom Designed Interfaces
-667 RS Graphics
-Custom Desgined GWD with Interfaces
-NEW RS AUTOCAST FEATURE
-Working Spirit Shield Effects
-Hand Cannon, Arcane Stream, Ring of Vigour Effects
-Dungeoneering Skillcape Emotes, Chaotic Shields
-NO DUPES, ALL BUGS FIXED sucks for u glitchers lol
-602 Animations, 602 GFX, 474 Maps, 614 Items, 317 Characters
-Enhanced GFX Rendering Looks Smoother!
-Donaters has a portal for funpk
-Perfect RS Hand Cannon Fixed
-Perfect Constitution x10 Hits and HP
-Very accurate Special Calcs for PvP Server
-Near Flawless Combat System
-Perfect RS Chaotic Crossbow
-Real RS Dung Teleport /w Kinship Ring
-Dungeoneering is by far the most advanced from ANY server!
-Working and Completely Custom PK Skill (exp from winning in wild)
-Very customisabled source files, as written in PI / DSPK style.
-Real RS Barrage Orb’s for non freezing barrages.
-Perfect full screen
-All single doors open
-All double doors around the world open
-Lots more features! I wasnt going to add to much to this thread[/SIZE]

Pictures


All stats Do go up to 120 !

This is the real beasty RS experience where you can’t get it anywhere else but here!


And some of our beasty full working Minigames you can participate in!

Untitled_zpsee3dcbed.png383×768

Brand new agility!![/center]

Btw i give credits to hack3r owner of deathlypvpz, he helped me add some interfaces and added lodestone network!

Oh one other thing, you can get a 99 cape, and a max cape at 99. the levels are at 120, for highscores and ranks, or for something to do!
